studyDesignType.name: studyDesignType
studyDesignType.title: Design Type
studyDesignType.description: Design types that are based on the overall experimental design.

studyAssayOrganism.name: studyAssayOrganism
studyAssayOrganism.title: Organism
studyAssayOrganism.description: The taxonomic name of the organism used in the Dataset or from which the  starting biological material derives.

studyAssayOtherOrganism.name: studyAssayOtherOrganism
studyAssayOtherOrganism.title: Other Organism
studyAssayOtherOrganism.description: If Other was selected in Organism, list any other organisms that were used in this Dataset. Terms from the NCBI Taxonomy are recommended.

studyAssayMeasurementType.name: studyAssayMeasurementType
studyAssayMeasurementType.title: Measurement Type
studyAssayMeasurementType.description: A term to qualify the endpoint, or what is being measured (e.g. gene expression profiling; protein identification).

studyAssayOtherMeasurmentType.name: studyAssayOtherMeasurmentType
studyAssayOtherMeasurmentType.title: Other Measurement Type
studyAssayOtherMeasurmentType.description: If Other was selected in Measurement Type, list any other measurement types that were used. Terms from NCBO Bioportal are recommended.

studyAssayTechnologyType.name: studyAssayTechnologyType
studyAssayTechnologyType.title: Technology Type
studyAssayTechnologyType.description: A term to identify the technology used to perform the measurement (e.g. DNA microarray; mass spectrometry).

studyAssayPlatform.name: studyAssayPlatform
studyAssayPlatform.title: Technology Platform
studyAssayPlatform.description: The manufacturer and name of the technology platform used in the assay (e.g. Bruker AVANCE).

studyAssayCellType.name: studyAssayCellType
studyAssayCellType.title: Cell Type
studyAssayCellType.description: The name of the cell line from which the source or sample derives.
